TopicTitle: Get Ready For the KSP In-Game Logo Contest: Create a Logos For In-Game Companies and

Articles.Content:
<p><img src="https://31.media.tumblr.com/8a5935078d0749ca56ac7b561a31f9b1/tumblr_inline_n17m9xOHpb1rr2wit.png"/></p>

<p>Kerbin companies are in search of the most creative individuals on the planet to create logos for them in a <strong>brand new contest</strong> that goes live this coming <strong>Monday.</strong><br/><br/>Create and submit logos for your favorite in-game companies and they may well <strong>become official logos</strong> in <em><strong>Kerbal Space Program</strong></em>. You can even win the chance to <strong>have your name enshrined in our Kerbal name generator</strong>! Click the <a href="http://bit.ly/1hsEmQw"><strong>LINK</strong></a> for all the info you’ll need to get started. Good luck!<strong><br/></strong></p>

Looks awesome, although I'm no artist it will be cool to see what the community comes up with.

But, I see there's no Devnote Tuesday

Looks awesome, although I'm no artist it will be cool to see what the community comes up with.

But, I see there's no Devnote Tuesday

Uhm, maybe the devnote comes out in a few hours... By the way, I'm pretty excited about the contest too
Should be fun, indeed. I confess that I'm not exactly a graphics artist, but I will submit something anyway when the time comes.
Looks lke we are still fair bit away from 0.24 release. A week for artists, then time to select best arts, time to implement them in game...A month?
We can't make flags for "found on the side of the road"?!?

Looks lke we are still fair bit away from 0.24 release. A week for artists, then time to select best arts, time to implement them in game...A month?

What makes you think the logo's will be implemented in .24?

I think 0.24 will be mostly under the hood stuff. Paving the road for the NASA mission pack, new tutorials, hopefully a Unity update with improved part-joints. And probably some software-infrastructure for records and contracts (I think they are related, keeping track of what you did and checking if you reached certain goals).

Logo's are not something to be rushed, I think you should expect it for 0.25.
Im am already a head of all of you!! drew some up today on paper........(whisper) I WILL WIN
I already have one, I made it 4-5 days ago... I'ma win.
For those who feel they need a bit of creative grounding by knowing what each company makes, I've compiled a list for your convenience.

Im am already a head of all of you!! drew some up today on paper........(whisper) I WILL WIN
